a region home to prosperity and

\willI'm sure you four already know the

\willDo you four know of that destroyed
fortress out in the Blazing Sands?
\willFor future reference, it's out in the east.
\willLong ago, nearing the end of the
great war, the fortress was one of
the last remaining bases for us
of the Overworld, and there were a scant
few places where us humans could have
down inside, holding the fort as
that had come looking for a safe haven,
but other than that, it was mostly
\willThe issue was, no matter how many
no matter how many fireballs the
the library, an adventurer found an
old, battered scroll; a scroll older
than anything else in the library.
\willWith the monsters banging on the door
and the time ticking, the magic users
to perform the ritual on the scroll.
\willEverything was set up, and the mages
gathered around the scroll and began
and a blast of light emerged from
\willEveryone was blinded, but as the light
faded from their eyes, they saw the door
blasted wide open, with not a single
They could run around outside! They
were free, even if only for a single
\willMany went on walks for hours, and
legends say that the sands glowed
\willWith a resupply of food and a breath
of fresh air, the soldiers and adventurers
returned to the fort satisfied, ready for
in and slaughtered every last person
was left to fend for itself.
\willThe magic in the sands kept the souls
of those poor soldiers living. Those souls
are most likely still wandering the halls
of the fort to this day.
wander those halls for all of eternity,
thanks to the doings of one of
\willIt's your job to go defeat the
\willI doubt you'll even be able to get

\willI think I might know a way in. Key
word here is "might," but hey, anything
\willLegends have been passed down of an
ancient relic that has the power to
It is filled with the enchanted
direct control of time, only allowing
you to switch between the present and
\willIt supposedly is in tune with where
and when the sand was placed into it.
\willThis means that if it was created at
the fort, it most likely will only turn
time back at the fort and to the time
\willWith a name that has the word "Archaic"
in it, I think it's safe to bet that it's
pretty old. It should hopefully take you
to a time when the fort was in better repair.
\willThe legends say it should be at the
peak of the Great Pyramid. However, this
isn't confirmed, as no one has been
to the top of it for a long time.
\willI think this is your best bet, though.
